item.text: Now there was a man in Caesarea named Cornelius, a centurion of what was known as the Italian Cohort.

He<n id="1" /> was a <st data-num="2152" class="">devout</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>-<st data-num="5399">fearing</st> man,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4862">as was</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household;</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1654">acts of charity</st> for the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1189" class="">prayed</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223 3956">regularly</st>.

<st data-num="5616" class="">About</st><st data-num="5610 1766"> three o’clock</st> one <st data-num="2250" class="">afternoon</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="5320" class="">clearly</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> a <st data-num="3705" class="">vision</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> who <st data-num="1525">came in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2883">Cornelius</st>.”

<st data-num="816" class="">Staring</st> at <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">becoming</st> <st data-num="1719">greatly afraid</st>, Cornelius<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> it, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>?” The angel<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1654">acts of charity</st><n id="4" /> have <st data-num="305">gone up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3422" class="">memorial</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1715" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3343" class="">summon</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">man</st> named <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>.

<st data-num="3778">This man</st> is <st data-num="3579">staying as a guest</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">man</st> named <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, a <st data-num="1038" class="">tanner</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>.”

<st data-num="5613">When</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> who had <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="565" class="">departed</st>, Cornelius<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> of his <st data-num="3610">personal servants</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2152" class="">devout</st> <st data-num="4757" class="">soldier</st> from among those who <st data-num="4342" class="">served</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" />
and when he had explained everything to them, he sent them to Joppa.
About noon the next day, while they were on their way and approaching the city, Peter went up on the roof to pray.

He <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="4361" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="1089" class="">eat</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> while <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="3903" class="">preparing</st> the meal, a <st data-num="1611" class="">trance</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> an <st data-num="4632" class="">object</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3607" class="">sheet</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st>,<n id="5" /> being <st data-num="2524">let down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st><n id="6" /> by its <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="746" class="">corners</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3739">it</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5225" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3956">all kinds</st> of <st data-num="5074">four-footed animals</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2062" class="">reptiles</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3772">wild</st> <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">said</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="450">Get up</st>, <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter;</st> <st data-num="2380" class="">slaughter</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3365">Certainly not</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="3763" class="">never</st> <st data-num="2068">eaten</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="2839" class="">defiled</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="169">ritually unclean</st>!”<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st><n id="1" /> spoke <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, a <st data-num="1208">second time</st>, “<st data-num="3739">What</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="2511">made clean</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> consider<n id="2" /> ritually <st data-num="2840" class="">unclean</st>!”<n id="3" />
This happened three times, and immediately the object was taken up into heaven.
Now while Peter was puzzling over what the vision he had seen could signify, the men sent by Cornelius had learned where Simon’s house was and approached the gate.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5455">called out</st> to <st data-num="4441" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, <st data-num="1941" class="">known as</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>,<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="3579" class="">staying</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">there</st> <st data-num="3579" class="">as a guest</st>.

While <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> was still <st data-num="1760">thinking seriously</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3705" class="">vision</st>, the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846">him</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! <st data-num="5140">Three</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> are <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="450">get up</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2597">go down</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4198 4862">accompany</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">hesitation</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2597">went down</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2400" class="">Here</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3739" class="">person</st> you’re <st data-num="2212" class="">looking</st> for. <st data-num="5101 156">Why</st> have you <st data-num="3918" class="">come</st>?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3883">Cornelius</st> the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316">God</st>-<st data-num="5399">fearing</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="3140">well spoken of</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>,<n id="3" /> was <st data-num="5537" class="">directed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> a <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> to <st data-num="3343" class="">summon</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> a <st data-num="4487" class="">message</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

So Peter invited them in and entertained them as guests.

On the next day he got up and set out with them, and some of the brothers from Joppa accompanied him.

<st data-num="1887">The following day</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="2542" class="">Caesarea</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="2883" class="">Cornelius</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4328">waiting anxiously</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and had <st data-num="4779">called together</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4773" class="">relatives</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="316" class="">close</st> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1096">came in</st>, <st data-num="2883" class="">Cornelius</st> <st data-num="4876" class="">met</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> his <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, and <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">helped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="450">Stand up</st>. <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="444">mere mortal</st>.”<n id="2" />

Peter<n id="1" /> continued <st data-num="4926">talking with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> as he <st data-num="1525">went in</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="4183">many people</st> <st data-num="4905">gathered together</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">know</st> that<n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="111" class="">unlawful</st><n id="2" /> for a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2853" class="">associate</st> with <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">visit</st> a <st data-num="246" class="">Gentile</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2504">yet</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="1166" class="">shown</st> <st data-num="2504">me</st> that I should <st data-num="3004" class="">call</st> <st data-num="3367">no person</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2839" class="">defiled</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> ritually <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> when you <st data-num="3343" class="">sent for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="369" class="">without any objection</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Now</st> may I <st data-num="4441" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="5101 3056">why</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="3343" class="">sent for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”

<st data-num="2883" class="">Cornelius</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5067">Four</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> ago <st data-num="3360">at</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>, at <st data-num="1766" class="">three o’clock in the afternoon</st>,<n id="3" /> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">suddenly</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2986" class="">shining</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">clothing</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2883">Cornelius</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> has been <st data-num="1522" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1654">acts of charity</st><n id="1" /> have been <st data-num="3415" class="">remembered</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3333" class="">summon</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, <st data-num="3739">who</st> is <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>. <st data-num="3778">This man</st> is <st data-num="3579">staying as a guest</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> the <st data-num="1038" class="">tanner</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2281">sea</st>.’
Therefore I sent for you at once, and you were kind enough to come. So now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to say to us.”
Then Peter started speaking: “I now truly understand that God does not show favoritism in dealing with people,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st><n id="1" /> the person who <st data-num="5399" class="">fears</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">does</st> <st data-num="1343">what is right</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1184" class="">welcomed</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

You know<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> to the <st data-num="5207" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="2097">proclaiming the good news</st> of <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="6" /> (<st data-num="3778">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="7" /> of <st data-num="3956">all</st>)—

<st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4487">what</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">throughout</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st>, <st data-num="757" class="">beginning</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">announced:</st><n id="1" />

with respect to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3478" class="">Nazareth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613">that</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5548" class="">anointed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> with the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> with <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>. <st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1330" class="">went around</st> <st data-num="2109" class="">doing good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2390" class="">healing</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who were <st data-num="2616" class="">oppressed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Judea</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="3" /> They<n id="4" /> <st data-num="337" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st> by <st data-num="2910" class="">hanging</st> him <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="3586" class="">tree</st>,<n id="5" />
